# Data visualization 
Loading libraries
```{r}
library(dplyr)
```

Import dataset
```{r}
# reading the csv file
hf.crop.prod <- read.csv("data/hf.crops_combined.csv")
hf.crop.prod

#unique(hf.crop.prod[,"crop_type"])
```

Data transformation using dplyr
```{r}
# filter only for food crops and year 2015
year_2015 <- filter(hf.crop.prod, year==2015)
year_2015
```
